name: Bone Memories
description:
Necro, a once normal fish, lived in a reef until it died.

After its death, Necro revives but finds that all its memories are gone!

Help Necro find his lost memories by following its Bone Shards.

While collecting them, its self will be reignited like the undying flame that brougth him back!

Credits:

1A Alicia: Charakter, Programming, Assets, UI

Programms used:

Asprite - PixelArt Assets and Character

Unity 3.4.1 - Game Engine

Sites used:

We love Indies - Sound-Assets

pixabay - Sound-Assets
